item.title: Win a Philips Electric Shaver for Father's Day gift, sponsored by Lvl.99
item.description: Fatherâ€™s Day is just around the corner! Do you have a gift in mind for Dad? The man who has been the most caring guardian for you deserves something nice! No idea yet? This is where CyberMiles comes to rescue! Enter to win a Philips Electric Shaver ($50). This prize is sponsored by lvl.99, a CyberMiles genesis Validator. Lvl 99 is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. It represents a group of Indonesia investors who had supported CyberMiles since day one.
